AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: T.1 Holm Oak - Reduce height and spread to previous points by a maximum of 2m, 20% crown thin, deadwood and monitor progression of Ganoderma.T.2 Holm Oak - Deadwood and monitor progression of Ganoderma.T.3 Oak - 2.5m Holistic crown reduction & deadwood.T.4 Yew - 1m Holistic crown reduction & deadwood.
